chapters.title: Chapter 5: Questioners
chapters.info: Rianna Andomeran, p. 115 (95)—Aes Sedai of the Black Ajah, openly a member of the White Ajah until she left the Tower with Liandrin. She is one of three Black sisters that Amico knew of before leaving the Tower. She has a white streak above her left ear, which makes her easy to spot.
